summary: Ever wanted to travel the roads of Skyrim as Kevin VanNord, the greatest warrior to ever live? Well now you can with this preset! Just load him up and begin the chicken slaughtering!
descriptionHtml:
So, I was looking through the Nexus and the Steam Workshop and saw that there was a very lack of Kevin VanNord, specifically Kevin VanNord himself. So I rewatched some old Top 5 Skyrim Mods of the Week episodes and decided to recreate Kevin himself! I think I got him down very well, almost perfect if I do say so myself. He may look different in your game than he does in the screenshots simply because I have mods which alters the males of Skyrim. I'll post them under the recommendation mods down below. Anyway, enjoy! I hope everyone likes this preset! :) 

How to Install:
1.) Unzip or Extract Archive
2.) Go to the (C:) drive on your computer and click it. Then click on Program Files (x86). (Note some computers my be set up differently.) 
3.) Now go to your Skyrim Directory. (Steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim)
4.) Now Click on the Data folder and go to the SKSE folder, then Plugins, then CharGen, then Presets.
5.) Finally drag the official file (.jslot) into your Presets's folder and then close everything. 
6.) Start up Skyrim and then either begin a new came or press the "~" button and type "showracemenu"
7.) Then go to the Presets tab in the racemenu and hit F5 and click on "Kevin_VanNord_Original".
8.) Now you're done! The Preset should automatically change your character to Kevin VanNord. Now just rename him and enjoy! :D

Required Mods:
Racemenu: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?
Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE): http://skse.silverlock.org/ 

Recommended Mods: 
SkySight Skins - Ultra HD 4K and 2K - Male Textures and Real Feet Meshes: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58443/?
Northborn Scars: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49279/?
Brows: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?
Beards: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?
Superior Lore-Friendly Hair - HD textures (This is pretty much for the NPC's since Kevin doesn't have much hair. :P ): http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36510/?


**Also if you want to use Kevin in your current game, but don't want to lose all your stats to the "showracemenu" command, here's an alternative. Lossless Race Menu gives you a spell which allows you to go into the racemenu and change your character, but not your stats. I highly recommend it! :) 

Lossless Race Change: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33968/?
author: Jckspacy
